sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊爾裔香港註冊大學學生均可參加。

sentences.english: What we would really like to do is get the image descriptor from the image registry.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正想做的是從圖像註冊表獲取圖像描述符。

sentences.english: If no domain is registered, the money is refunded in full.
sentences.chinese: 如果客戶沒有註冊任何域名，那麼保證金將全部返還。

sentences.english: Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: Please attach copy of your HKID card or registration slip(s).
sentences.chinese: 請附身份證或註冊證副本。

sentences.english: This article shows you how to create a user registration form from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 本文向您展示了創建用戶註冊表單的全過程。

sentences.english: All shareholders of the company agree to the deregistration.
sentences.chinese: 公司全體股東同意撤銷註冊。

sentences.english: Trademark registrants enjoy trademark rights and receive protection under law.
sentences.chinese: 商標註冊人享有商標權，受法律保護。

sentences.english: Will Microsoft open testing sign-ups again when RC1 is released?
sentences.chinese: 微軟是否會再RC1發佈時打開測試註冊嗎？

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 經商標局覈准後，發給註冊人相應證明，並予以公告。

sentences.english: On-line order and signup for online trial.
sentences.chinese: 網上訂單和註冊爲在線試用。

sentences.english: Q13. What if someone copies my Registered Design?
sentences.chinese: 如果有人複製我已註冊的外觀設計該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Second-level domain names may be applied for directly under the top-level domain names.
sentences.chinese: 在頂級域名下可以直接申請註冊二級域名。

sentences.english: You can opt to sign up for a specialized dating site.
sentences.chinese: 你可以嘗試在一個專門的交友網站註冊帳號。

sentences.english: A domain consists of a registry and zero or more connectivity providers.
sentences.chinese: 域由一個註冊表和零個或更多連通性提供方組成。

definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
